name: Candy Salon: Makeover Games for Girls
name_original: Candy Salon: Makeover Games for Girls
description:
It’s time for a sweet makeover! Run your Candy Beauty Salon - choose one of these candy models and turn them into the sweetest celebrities ASAP! Don’t miss your chance to be a fashion producer in the Candy World. Show your sparkling talent and taste of yummy fashion!

Candy hair salon games free for girls:
This girl needs a candy hairstyle! Welcome to beauty hair salon fashion spa treatments! Wash hair with a shampoo, dry, comb tangled hair using different professional candy styling tools and yummy cosmetics. Now choose an appropriate haircut. At your disposal is a wide selection of hair styles: long cotton hair, short cuts, curly or straight hair. Dye your model’s hair in hairstyle games for girls. Go wild with yummy colors - it's candy makeover games! How about rainbow hair? Create a tasty style with awesome hair accessories for various occasions. Select from a huge collection of candy cane tiaras for a photo shoot, cute hair bands and ice cream hair clips for a romantic date or glamorous hats for a high fashion show. Wow! She looks delicious!

Makeup artist games:
Your model needs a shiny makeup to complete the look. Choose from tons of colorful eye shadows, mascara, juicy lipsticks and more! And don’t forget that yummy accessories is a must have of this season! Shiny sugar jewelry and animated tattoos will turn your model into a stylish celebrity!

Fashion photoshoot games for girls
Find the juiciest looks to help your candy model get ready for a magazine cover photoshoot. But you should select necessary accessorizes as fast as possible – the more photos your model takes the more chances for her to get on the cover of a fashionable magazine.

Beauty Contest and red carpet fashion games (makeup games for kids)
OMG! Your model looks so sweet that everybody will have a crush on her! Compete against other models to win likes in social media. Vote for your beautiful model. Stay in the competition as long as possible.

Shop in spa and salon games:
Use likes earned in the competition to buy exclusive accessories and cosmetics for your model in doll makeover salon. Buy looks and royal makeup sets to be the hottest girl!

What can you do in these model makeover games for girls?
- Choose from 3 pretty top models who are dying to start working with you;
- Play 4 mini games with cute animations and tons of fun surprises;
- Style hair with various professional tools;
- Use huge collections of hair accessories and jewelry;
- Apply makeup with yummy facials in the Makeup Salon. There you’ll find dozens of eye shadows, lipsticks, rouge and many more!
- Go in style with beautiful animated tattoos;
- Prove that you’re the best! Take part in Beauty Contests and win likes for your protégé.
